department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Three panels; lace at neck; ribbon rondels at tops of shoulder, center of front and back; lace trim on neck and sleeves; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning; geometric design, and bird in tree design in yellow and magenta; collector's number 121; , natural shell dye.
medium: Cotton, silk; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
